author: cms-tau-pog
body:
This is a version of backporting small fixes and cleanups from 81X, this time w/o internal merge conflicts. Rest is equivalent to this PR (*) that I would close after this one is integrated. 

Cheers,
Roger

(*)

title: backport of small fixes from 81X branch
